title: SQL connection - error saving connections
author: nocturneop15
body_snippet:
connection to SQL is successfull, the same for DB scheme population script. When I save connection, no error is given by application, but is logged in mremote.log - after reopening mRemote, connection DB remains empty. 

Error log: 
2020-08-18 20:33:31,562 [1] INFO  - mRemoteNG 1.77.1.27713 Přenosná verze starting.
2020-08-18 20:33:31,579 [1] INFO  - Command Line: D:\Applications\mRemote\mRemoteNG.exe
2020-08-18 20:33:31,871 [1] INFO  - Microsoft Windows 10 Pro N  64-bit
2020-08-18 20:33:3...

iterations.description: SQL save silently fails when database version verification fails — error is logged but not surfaced to the user, leaving the DB empty with no UI feedback.

notes:
AI triage (claude): SQL save silently fails when database version verification fails — error is logged but not surfaced to the user, leaving the DB empty with no UI feedback.
Approach: In Save(), when VerifyDatabaseVersion() returns false, surface the error to the user (throw or show notification) instead of silently returning after logging ErrorConnectionListSaveFailed.
